BT.managers

Class DiagramPlacesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.DiagramPlacesManager

  • public class DiagramPlacesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds every place manager. This class is used to store every place and operations with it. It holds number of diagram (index of tab). File name (name of opened file). UcPlaces actors and actions of useCase diagram. CdPlaces class diagram classes. PnPlaces are stored in arrayList because of methods can have petriNet too.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
